title: Episode 02 - Walk, Talk and Learn French
description: In this episode, Pierre-Benoît discusses the expression "dès que" and also looks at "ne ... plus".
content:encoded: In this episode, Pierre-Benoît discusses the expression "dès que" and also looks at "ne ... plus".
itunes:subtitle: In this episode Pierre-Benoît discusses the phrases 'dès que' and 'ne ... plus'.
